name: Newton and the Apple Tree
description: Syuji Asanaga and his childhood friend Yotsuko Utakane, while tracking down Syuji's missing grandfather, unexpectedly end up traveling through time to the 17th century! Upon arrival, they are greeted by a small, flat-chested girl who would one day be known as Sir Isaac Newton!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
